name: 50 Short Games
summary:
Being a collection of 50 SHORT GAMES designed by Thecatamites of Harmony World to amuse and instruct, as previously posted individually to glorioustrainwrecks.com, now bundled, for ease of loading.

Contains Loader. Contains Notes. Contains 50 games.
